title: Media buffering, seeking, and time ranges
summary: Sometimes it's useful to know how much <audio> or <video> has downloaded or is playable without delay â€” a good example of this is the buffered progress bar of an audio or video player. This article discusses how to build a buffer/seek bar using TimeRanges, and other features of the media API.
